channel.title: Error while running the server... Not while compiling.. D:
channel.description:
Well, no one can log on. It's just all black...
I get an error in my Run.bat saying: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:281) at ItemHandler.(init)(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:113)[/code]

item.title: Error while running the server... Not while compiling.. D:
item.dc:creator: @12mil 12mil
item.description:
@12mil wrote:

its a config error, use the tab key instead of space bar in config files, Try looking into ur config files like shops and that and look for spacing errors >hope this helped<

Read full topic
item.source: Error while running the server... Not while compiling.. D:

item.title: Error while running the server... Not while compiling.. D:
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

Jordiescape:

Use the TAB button to space in configuration files, go through what you recently added and tab the spaces.

I just went through everything i remember editing last night D: SHIT!

So there’s no way to find out what line the error’s on?

Read full topic

item.title: Error while running the server... Not while compiling.. D:
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

Wiplayer:

You can try re-tabbing line 281 or 173?

Erm, but that’s inside of my itemhandler, I’ve never messed with that before.

He said my problem was with Item.cfg, which i do change a lot. :\

Read full topic

item.source: Error while running the server... Not while compiling.. D:

item.title: Error while running the server... Not while compiling.. D:
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

Si Force:

If you’ve edited your ‘Item.CFG’ file before you attempted to run, you’ve made a mistake there. Don’t forget to use the TAB key as spaces or you will get errors as such.

Hmm, thanks! But, do you have any idea where it would be in that 300,000 lines of damn text? Lmao… There’s nothing that says anything about it, is there?..

Read full topic
item.source: Error while running the server... Not while compiling.. D:

item.title: Error while running the server... Not while compiling.. D:
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

If you’ve edited your ‘Item.CFG’ file before you attempted to run, you’ve made a mistake there. Don’t forget to use the TAB key as spaces or you will get errors as such.

Read full topic
